message.body: I hope you're not actually up
I am up right now. My phone is...somewhere
Might be in the car
Had it on the train, but fell asleep
Should have grabbed it before I stood up, but can't find it
Don't want to walk out to car
hmmm
phone died too
Might be the last I see of it
ah'
I think I txt you at some point asking if you where home yet
didnt hear back, assumed you had met an unfortunate fate
haha sorry
btw, appar guy#3 is sort of dating some chick
further proof I have terrible taste in men
Men who will intentionally text girls and lead them on while dating someone else, more or less
tsk tsk
yeah
I dunno, I try not to judge
yeah, i don't care
I should go to sleep
I had another 'incident' with claire
apparently someone said something about, 'oh, he's suppose to see liz later...'
Ugh
sorry
wait
no, it's no biggie
how would they know
that's what I don't get
I guess they assume?
I didn't say anything to anyone
I barely talk to anyone there during the week
I don't think of it as a problem
had fun though
yeah? ;)
saturday should be...interesting
and I don't think you have terrible taste in men
Meh
I don't care
although that was the one that I would have been at least interested in dating, hah
ah, yeah that's usually how it goes
he said he felt a "spark", but apparently not enough
whatevs
He's 24 and I have other things to entertain me
was he the blue eyes you showed me?
haha, so Lee just called me
he's at Val's, and her dad is apparently none to pleased, so he asked if he can crash on my couch...poor guy
uh, mayb
e
lol
whatev
and if he was, why her house for the first time?
bad planning
pleeeeeeeease lemme go to sleep, lols
say hi to lee for me
kk, night night
=D
ttyl
I would've come over, if I wasnt stuck in wilmington all nigh. See ya Saturday
haha, those ol' boys got yer head spinning!
I just don't understand
I don't understand being all texty and flirty one day, and literally the next day being incredibly taciturn and quiet
Makes it seem like you're faking one or the other
So I want to figure out which
I'm pretty sure it's just about impossible to do that
there's just no way of knowing what is going through someone's mind
even if you ask them, they will probably not tell you the whole truth, if any at all
reading minds ftw
yeah
If I had a choice of superpowers, I'd go with omniscience
I dunno
I have a fear of knowing everything
I mean, what's the point then?
besides, you're elitist enough as it is
problem?
=P
to be omniscient removes the human element
would probably scare away most guys
I seem to excel at scaring them away anyway
So not much would change
except the knowing part
and this coming from someone who isn't interested in dating
aside: are you going to the beer week event tonight?
Which one? lol
hehe, any?
And yes, that's the plan
New Deck tavern, to be specific
I'll be on those streets, but in Center City, haha
sansom?
Well, not specifically Sansom
http://www.phillybeerweek.org/bio_page.cfm?venue_code=390
Sansom is sandwiched between Chestnut and Walnut
my plans tonight are Varga, Good Dog Bar, and Molly Malloy's
not in that order
some cs'ers are gonna be out that way
I wish there was an easier way to figure out the commuting part
yeah
I haven't decided if I want to train or drive tonight
Prob train =/
yeah, you've had a lot of success with that =|
I'll just never not take the train home again =P
If you're talking about last night, it was fine
I wasn't looking for a specific train
Things ended and I walked to the station
It was just unfortunate that I walked in literally as the train was leaving
yeah, that's what sucks about the train
as long as you time it correctly it's fine
I talked to this random guy who had no desire to talk to me at all, haha
Was interesting
hey, now you know how men feel
lol
I talked to a girl at the bar last night
turns out we both worked together like ten years ago
I went to talk to him because the station was like empty
And I didn't like sitting completely by myself
Figured it'd be safer to risk that guy being crazy than being not-sober and sitting by myself.
That's cool
I almost asked her to come sit with us, but decided against it
may or may not have had something to do with claire being there
Seems like you might be considering Claire a little more than you should be, given the current state of things
Maybe that chick was the one you were meant to spend the rest of your life with, but you walked away from her because someone who might someday unload her baggage was present.
haha
now you're just thinking about it too much
No, I'm exaggerating to make my point
You're not married
You're not engaged
girl#2, who was at the bar with her friend, seemed rather uninterested
So you talked to 2 girls at the bar?
im pretty sure the claire factor wouldnt have deterred me significantly
Or the former coworker chick was girl2?
technically, there were two
k
she was nice enough, and appeared to be there alone until her friend came over
So...3 girls?
I need a cast list
eh?
if you count claire?
Claire Coworker chick _____? _____?
Friend of coworker chick?
Or Chick2 + friend?
yes, that's it
Okay
Claire, Christina, Karen
Chick2 and coworker chick are the same, right?
Or is Chick2 the friend?
lol
Christina, co-worker, Karen, friend of...
Apparently you like chicks with hard-C names
hmmm, kinda
Kinda like the ending in 'ah' names
I didn't get the impression that Christina was particularly interested, more just bored
ah
nice looking woman though
older, I believe
I think claire does like me, which of course, makes me less interested
lol
so you meeting up with some of your boys tonight?
I might see the one who's dating people, but it's incidental
I'm pretty much stalking Troegs tonight
hmmm
dating people?
No
sorry, wasn't paying attention
He's "semi-seriously talking" to some chick (his words)
you seemed rather indifferent to him last night
hmmm
And isn't apparently looking to take on more female company at this point
Think I scared him off last night
no big deal
but still talking to other people?
What do you mean?
sorry, he's
Okay, so we met at the Saturday brewfest. And through a combination of chance and intention ended up spending like an hour or so together
We kind of hit it off
Just felt natural, whatever
a bit douchey, to say he's semi-serious and talking you up
Then we were texting for a bit that night
And then he kind of went silent
But still kind of communicating
ok, fair enough
So I asked him which of the two brewer events he was going to be at last night.
And I think I added "Or would I just be wasting my time" or something haha
so what did you think scared him off?
And then I got the "I felt a spark, but I'm s-srsly talking to this chick. I feel really bad about leading you on, and if I had been more sober, things prob wouldn't have gone as far as they did"
I probably should have taken semi-seriously talking to more seriously
I've just never heard someone phrase it like that, so I assumed it was pretty casual
But it seems like the serious part was more serious than I thought
/shrug
I really just shouldn't have gone yesterday by myself. Prob would have been fine if I'd brought a friend.
yeah, I think it was really 'serious, but I want to mask my doucheyness somewhat'
Me being there by myself probably looked stalkery
Maybe
He seems like a nice kid though
I'm not that concerned
There _was_ kind of a spark though, so part of me is "aww"
so did you meet up with him at all?
Oh yeah.
I ended up hanging around there for awhile
Which is what I'm saying
I probably gave the wrong impression
really I just didn't feel like walking anywhere else, and I was getting free beer
So.../shrug
His older brother's kind of cute
Would that be weird?
why would that be weird?
were you talking to them?
Yeah, I was chatting with him the kid on and off
I feel you on the 'aww' though
And with other people along the beer line
His brother showed up to help break stuff down
even when it seems doomed to fail, there's still that feeling
I heard back from the principal of my elementary school. He said I could come by on friday, the kids are off but teachers will be there
thought you had plans Friday
well, this would be in the morning
and would involve me leaving from your place
So you want to come over tonight
eh, I'm debating
I mean, how do you feel?
That's fine with me
It'll take some synchronizing =/
in a way, I feel we 'owe' it to each other, do you know what I mean. Of course, we don't really
What, lol.
You're hilarious.
there's this unspoken rule in fwb arrangements
Oh?
If it's unspoken, how is one supposed to know of it
like a support thing, like we always have each other as a backup
lol
I know, sounds awful
Nah, makes sense-ish.
In a way
but it is a comforting thing
lol
Cracking up right now
and can take the edge off the dating irregularities
So you're driving into the city
but, at the same time, you can become dependent on it, just have to watch out
eh, I mean I feel the best option would be to meet at the train station?
or at your place and ride to the city together
Uh, I guess it depends
that's the part Im struggling with
I generally feel that the train only makes sense when it's just you,
if its two or more people, you might as well drive
Yeah, unless you're planning on drinking substantially
and that
and I am not
I need to stop =\
Drinking?
Where's the fun in that
substancially
Ah
Yeah.
I was fairly lit last night
Lit as in drunk or lit as in lit?
haha, I gave claire a weak hug when she left...everyone busted my balls
And way too concerned in your love life
so I grabbed her bear-hug style and picked her up and spun around
Did you knock shit over?
nope
props
poor girl
whatever she prob likes the attention, and Im not coming on strong or anything
I can take the train in, and we can meet up in the city and drive back to the train station then to my place?
That seems like the most efficient way, really
what cracks me up is how my friends are already acting like she's off limits
like I claimed her
Haha
You kind of have
It's nice for them to back off
I have news about josh as well
lol
but Im not suppose to say anything...
Oh?
is it about him prob breaking up while he's in Sweden?
eh, like I said...
Why would you do that to me.
not really suppose to say anything
oh?
Not because I really want to know
But because you just told me that there's something I don't know
And that I can't know
cmon, you're a smart girl...
There are any number of things that it could be
I could just ask him directly
sure, but there's really only one that it WOULD be
NO! you can't speak of this to anyone!
Does he have cancer? =|
srsly?
Did you guys finally consummate your bromance?
haha, yeah but everyone knows that
I'm not guessing out of spite.
he does have nice eyes =]
yes
please, you already know
Not guessing out of spite.
=P
fine
This might actually be a really useful tactic for me
like I said, you already know. It's really that surprising
I'm glad I thought of it
really not? that surprising?
Did you a word?
*not
sorry, distracted over ere
Is Josh there?
Are you getting lost in his eyes?
In the future, I'm serious, please don't hint things to me if you're not going to do the "I'm not supposed to say anything....but I will anyway" thing.
I don't mind the conversational construction; I just don't like it not actually ending in information exchange.
Btw, my current favorite not-guess is that Josh has changed his tickets to Mumbai and is running away to join the circus.
I feel like I gave you enough information
haha, you're hilarious
You don't seem to understand how my brain works.
but not entirely far off
clearly
besides, I offered you the opportunity to guess, which you probably would be successful at, but spite
yeah, but you wouldn't confirm
So it's futile
but I wouldnt NOT confirm, therefore it would be confirmed
I feel bad for feeling this way, but I was kinda glad when he told me
and the fact that he doesn't seem that upset makes me feel better
Because you've always been fond of circuses?
XD
now you're just playing dumb
No, I was making a joke
=P
not my fault you're not in a joking mood
why is whatever-it-is a big secret?
More high school politics?
well, not really
he just wants some time to deal with it himself before its out in the open
it's not like no one is going to find out
Especially with you going around hinting at things
I imagine he will keep it under wraps until after the party on sat
hehe
I wouldn't have said anything if I thought he would mind
and the chances of it coming up beyond this are extremely unlikely
How do you mean?
you wouldn't go around telling people
Oh
cuz I
I'd have to hurt you
lol
and I wouldn't tell anyone else
especially my other blabby friends
Hm, why would you tell me though?
cause it's eating me up inside?
O.o
what?
Can't tell if sarcastic
eh, yes and no
Note to self: Andres is not good with keeping secrets
Leads to indigestion
like I said, it's not so much a secret as he just doens't want the whole world to know
I don't mean that as you CAN'T
btw
at this particular moment
So...yeah... why would it be eating you up
you know how it is, when you know something that almost no one else knows. I'm pretty sure he told annie (his ex he's good friends with), who he's been spending time with recently
Yeah, but you said it's not _really_ a secret
right
So in that case, it shouldn't be bothering you any more than most of the details of my life
None of your friends know
I don't really want your friends to know
But it's not a secret
You're weird.
yeah, I just use my judgement
lol
he told me in confidence, because he knows I wont go around telling the whole world
and yes I am weird
and I do catch myself saying things that I probably shouldnt from time to time, and feel a little guilty
meh
Just don't have uptight friends
Things get out
/shrug
Entertainingly enough, your status complements the song I'm quoting from, haha
yeah, I don't know what to make of that/what you're referring to
but I'm sure that is intentional
Finch songs
It's not supposed to be hinting at anything
It's actually a band I listened to a lot with my ex
Ahh college.
So good
If you like kinda screamy stuff
With kick-ass lyrics
that much I had assumed
omg
auralgasm
grats
=P
You'll probably hate it
spotify?
Are you in a mood, or am I just too bubbly?
oh, you're at work
yeah
mood?
All your responses got really short and like "yeah, whatever?"
oh, Im very distracted right now, sorry
no worries
and Val needs to use the computer
Say hi to her for me =D
and I need to get off my ass and do some work
k
um, so what did we decide again?
We didn't concretely decide anything
Seems like you driving in, us rendezvousing in the city, and then heading to my car/apt would make the most sense
Rather than you coming all the way up past the city and then going back down
suppose
If you want to do something else, let me know
ok, what time you going in?
As soon as possible, really
Probably 8 or 9 train =/
ok
Ill let you know if anything changes
kk
gotta go, ttyl!
ciao
stay in touch
=P
don't flake ;)
haha, HAHA!
NEVERRR!
Was hoping you'd find that funny
